hero.name: Darlan Tane
hero.title: Data Analyst, Agronomy and agro-industry engineer
hero.description: Passionate about transforming data into actionable insights. With expertise in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools.

paragraphs: I am a passionate data analyst with a background in engineering and a strong focus on turning complex data into clear, actionable insights. I specialize in using Python, SQL, and various data visualization tools to solve business problems and improve decision-making processes.

My journey in data began during my engineering studies, where I discovered my passion for statistical analysis and data-driven decision making. Since then, I've expanded my skills to include machine learning techniques, business intelligence tools, and data visualization platforms.

journey.title: Discovering Data Analysis
journey.description: First exposure to data analysis with R and python during my engineering studies and my internship projects at Kumofoods and Sainte Lucie: Production costs optimization using an R language algorithm, and line performance indicators (KPIs) analysis using a Deep Learning program

journey.title: Mastering Python & SQL
journey.description: Developed strong coding skills for data manipulation through projects at Jedha : Air_pollution, Titanic survival pollution, Startup's profitability

journey.title: Business Intelligence
journey.description: Learned to create insightful dashboards with Power BI, Tableau and Looker studio at Jedha with projects like an Imdb_movies dashboard, and a SuperStore Dashboard

journey.title: Machine Learning
journey.description: Expanded skill set to include predictive analytics through certifications at Coursera

experience.title: Supply Chain Manager
responsibilities: Collected, cleaned and analyzed historical data using dashboards to anticipate demand peaks, price variations, and quarterly transportation costs
Optimized goods routing by 30% through analysis of delivery reports and real-time tracking of merchandise
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve supply chain efficiency

experience.title: Production Manager
responsibilities: Analyzed production line performance indicators (KPIs) using Deep Learning to predict performance values
Created 25 work instruction documents, ensuring operators' skill advancement in production activities
Planned production schedules based on human and material resources availability

experience.title: Production Line Analyst
responsibilities: Optimized production costs by 20% using an R algorithm to estimate costs and correlate them with KPIs
Initiated continuous improvement plans (5S) based on data analysis
Managed production flows and organized production teams

subjects: Python Programming: Data Exploration and Visualization (Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib)
SQL: Data Queries and Modeling (Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure, Snowflake)
Business Intelligence: Data Formatting, Exploration and Presentation (Power BI, Tableau, Looker Studio)
Big Data and Data Governance (Apache spark, Airflow)

education.degree: Intensive Preparatory Program for Engineering Schools

projects.name: Productivity Prediction Program
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict KPI values in a production workshop

projects.name: Startup's profitability
projects.description: Created a model to predict startups profitability

projects.name: Best-selling_video_games analysis
projects.description: Determined parameters behind a video game's success by collecting, processing and analyzing a database, and creating dashboards

projects.name: Titanic Survival Prediction
projects.description: Created a model to predict passenger survival on the Titanic using passenger data

projects.name: Air_Pollution
projects.description: Analysed parameters behind air pollution in USA

projects.name: SuperStore Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive dashboard to analyze sales and profitability of a superstore

projects.name: Imdb_movies Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive dashboard to analyze successful movies on Imdb

projects.name: MobyDoc Landing Page
projects.description: Designed and developed a landing page for a fictional company on Hubspot

contact.description: Interested in collaborating or have a project in mind? Feel free to reach out to me using the contact form or through my email or phone.

articles.title: 🚀 Can we predict a startup's profitability based on key business factors?
articles.description: How key business factors like R&D and marketing influence startup profitability through a predictive regression model?
articles.author: Darlan Tane

articles.title: 🚢 Predicting Titanic Survivors with Machine Learning
articles.description: Predict who survived the Titanic disaster using machine learning and data visualization.
articles.author: Darlan Tane

articles.title: 🌍 Can We Predict Air Pollution Levels in the US with Machine Learning?
articles.description: Can we use machine learning to forecast pollution levels in US cities? This project explores the limits of data and modeling in environmental prediction.
articles.author: Darlan Tane

articles.title: 🚨 No Appointments Available! Meet MobyDoc
articles.description: MobyDoc: A fictional startup designed to solve urgent medical appointment scheduling with a real-world landing page and analytics setup.
articles.author: Darlan Tane

articles.title: 🎬 Unlocking the Secrets of Box Office Success: A Power BI Film Analysis
articles.description: Bridging the gap between theoretical machine learning concepts and their practical applications in real-world scenarios.
articles.author: Darlan Tane

articles.title: 🧘‍♂️ Mastering Git & GitHub basics as a Data Analyst
articles.description: How I moved beyond the basics of Git and GitHub to truly understand version control—and why it’s now an essential part of my data analyst toolkit.
articles.author: Darlan Tane

articles.title: 🎮 What Makes a Video Game a Hit? Let’s Dive Into the Data
articles.description: A data deep-dive into what makes a video game successful—genres, pricing, platforms, and where to launch.
articles.author: Darlan Tane
